commit.message: Fixing a grammatical issue with the mail template (#195)

verification.payload:
tree bd2bf385288f907ef900564d89df4ca9fdf96213
parent f71c7f8d5f28095fd2f7d6c82451c50526d9d986
author Colm O hEigeartaigh <coheigea@users.noreply.github.com> 1591623309 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1591623309 +0100

Fixing a grammatical issue with the mail template (#195)

files.patch:
@@ -47,7 +47,7 @@ under the License.
   <!-- Password reset notifications -->
   <MailTemplate id="requestPasswordReset"
                 textTemplate="Hi,
-a password reset was request for ${user.getUsername()}.
+a password reset was requested for ${user.getUsername()}.
 
 In order to complete this request, you need to visit this link:
 
@@ -59,7 +59,7 @@ Best regards."
                 htmlTemplate="<html>
 <body>
 <p>Hi,
-a password reset was request for ${user.getUsername()}.</p>
+a password reset was requested for ${user.getUsername()}.</p>
 
 <p>In order to complete this request, you need to visit this 
 <a href="http://localhost:9080/syncope-enduser/confirmpasswordreset?token=${input.get(0).replaceAll(' ', '%20')}">link</a></p>.
